Title: Type-aware candidate collection
Description: Migrate candidate datatype collection and narrowing to use new type compatibility helpers.
Acceptance: Semantic candidate lists match expected results and regression tests pass.
Test_Method: cmake --build build-wsl | ctest --test-dir build-wsl -R SemanticCandidatesTest --output-on-failure | ctest --test-dir build-wsl --output-on-failure

Title: Constant folding modernization
Description: Update constant folding to use type-aware ConstValue while preserving outputs.
Acceptance: Constant folding tests pass with unchanged values for existing fixtures.
Test_Method: cmake --build build-wsl | ctest --test-dir build-wsl -R ConstantFoldingTest --output-on-failure | ctest --test-dir build-wsl --output-on-failure
